short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents the anti-selection scripts from web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It prevents anti-selection event handlers like document.body.onselectstart or anti-selection styles like user-select: none from web pages.

How to use?
You just click "Prevent anti-selection" button (the extension icon on the top) on the web page that prevents to selection.

It's open source! https://github.com/iamdual/dont-touch-my-selection
